item.title: EKC 19 JUST RELEASED. NEW ANIMATED BACKGROUNDS AND NEW SHORTCUT SECTION. SPORTS HAS A GREAT NEW SHORTCUT SECTION WITH ALL LIVE SPORTS INTEGRATED. NEW REVAMPED APK SECTION AS WELL. APKS WILL POPULATE INTO THE SHORTCUT SECTION.
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM SETUP. SIGN UP AT GEARSIPTVNOW.COM THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL. APKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD IN THE APK SECTION.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE / FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
